Just the App I was looking for Brilliant

I have been waiting so long for this app! I've tried others and they're just a pain, not user friendly at all. This has a brilliant, clear interface. Two clicks and I had the lights synced to music. Brilliant, totally worth the price.

content: Great app it'd be nice though to be able to connect the app to google home so the group you name comes on when you ask google assistant example "okay google turn on disco"

Had to buy all 3 for Hue!

content: Amazing app! Was look for awhile for music since etc and this app over delivered with its options and quality. 100% recommend if you're unsure what to purchase.

content: Good stuff, and I only have two bulbs so far.

content: Great app for the Hues lights. You can manually change the settings to fit any type of scene. Only want the lights to pulse, strobe or change on the bass? You can do that. Lot of themes already configured and a lot of options. Best 3 bucks I've spent on Google in a long time!
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Excellent app and colour combos. I would recommend getting more than one hue light because the different combos are awesome. This is the app you want if you want your lights to sync to the music. I can use my bose speaker and it works perfectly.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: I love it!
replyContent: Thank you! Please contact support@soundstorm.scottdodson.dev and let me know what I can do to get a 5-star rating.

content: It just works. Don't need complicated settings for these effects! Whether I'm tired, I'm happy, I'm sad, I'm learning or I'm growing. Lights dance to the music colors chosen by me. So relaxing. Very easy to use. Great price for ALL features. Good job dev. Thank you!
replyContent: Thank you so much!

content: Initially downloaded another app sponcered by Hue but returned immediately. This app is significantly better with fantastic ease of use.

WOW! The app of apps for Phillip's Hue bulbs. Just love this. So easy and enjoyable. I have many Hue bulbs and now once set to 'Rainbow' colour option and 'colour flow' my lights 'set up in a new group on the app' double as Xmas lights fading in and out with configurable brightness and delays and timers etc. Also many other features/modes and effects have yet to play with. Thanks.

Does successfully control my lights. Two main issues though. First, didn't detect the Hue Bridge on my network without manually entering the IP; I haven't had this problem with any other app. Second, I don't think the music visualizer is actually listening to the music. The lights change rhythmically but not in time with the music, it seems like it a constant tempo. I compared this to the Hue Disco app and the latter does vary the lights based on the temp.
replyContent: Hi David, sorry you had to manually enter the IP. This is usually not necessary as I use two methods to find the Hue Bridge. As for the music visualizer, please try adjusting the Volume Trigger on the Settings screen. You can also toggle on Detect Frequencies. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.dev for help and/or a full refund.

content: UPDATE: changing to 5 stars. Thank you for the tip, Scott. This app works! Original: Good app for syncing lights to music playing on your phone. I wish this worked with Google Home speakers.
replyContent: Hello, thank you for the review! The app uses your device's microphone to listen to the music and create the effects. The source of the audio does not have to come from your device so you can use your Google Home speakers. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.dev if you have any questions. Thanks!

Lol this has got to be a joke.
Hi 3 stars, if you can add all lights to strobe simultaneously instead of 1 by 1 I will change to 5 stars. Thank you.

content: if I can give 1000 stars I will! love it! great app! works amazing! 5 bulbs so far. turns your place to bloody night club! love light separation for different frequencies. just will install in on other phone and will use my main one! would be great to have functionality with headphones, but understand technical limitations. whatever! it's great! as a feedback- maybe worth trying neural networks approach to remove voices, noise etc, for better experiences, but it will come, I belive).

The Volume Trigger slider should be just to the right of the purple background that is fluctuating. Please contact support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io if you have any questions. Thanks!

content: love this app!!!

Edit:  Developer kind enough to reach out and offer a refund to me.   I find the app hard to use/figure out, and it doesn't seem to respond to sound even though I have provided microphone privileges. I tried tweaking the settings to improve the responsiveness, but it is still not satisfactory.
replyContent:
Please check that the app has permission to use your microphone by going to Settings - Apps - Soundstorm for Hue -
 Permissions - Microphone. You may also need to adjust the Volume Trigger on the Settings screen in the app. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for help. I can also give you a refund.

content: Just installed it and it works, does everything you'd expect, easy to navigate. Only found it as it's listed on the Hue App. Good work Devs!

replyContent: Hi Jean, thank you for the review. Which effect (e.g. Music Visualizer) are you using that keeps stopping? Do you mean incoming calls are stopping the light effects? Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io so I can help.

content: OK, I love this one as well. I like to take control of multiple light bulbs, switch up the volume sensitivity and become THE MIGHTY VOICE OF GOD! I guess you could play music to it as well...

Absolutely love this app! 1st one i downloaded for Hue and so glad i did. I 
tried it right away linked to music and it was amazing!!

Please help my lightstrip will not show up in this app and I have the paid 
version. It shows up in the many other apps I have for Hue and I have tried 
everything. I own a technology company so am savvy. PLEASE HELP for 5 
stars. UPDATE: I got a response for my problem over night & it worked so I 
wish there was 6 stars because I have tried every app made for controlling 
Hue lights & this is by far the best 1! The music algorithms alone are far 
superior & look much better than all of the rest. Would purchase again 
without hesitation! Thank you so much!!
replyContent: Hi Shane, you can refresh the Lights tab by pulling down on the list. The text "Pull to refresh..." will appear and an arrow icon will spin. After you do this, tap on the light/group to update the selected light(s). Please contact support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for help.

content:
I like the app the only major let down is the fact you can't use your

content:
As far as Hue music visualization apps go- this is, by far, the best of its 
kind.

It's exactly what I was looking for. It would be a great feature to 
"listen" to what is playing on the device than what comes into the 
microphone, but I love the features to refine how it responds to what comes 
in from the mic.

Works effortlessly. Like that I can group rooms or even the whole house. 
Picks up the beat really well. Loooove it

Update: solution offered by developer was able to restore the ability to 
use individual lights and groups for effects. Thanks for the prompt response

After you do this, tap on the light/group to update the selected light(s). Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for help. Thanks!

content: Gets stuck says loading. Sucks
replyContent: Hi Larry, sorry to hear you're not having a great experience. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io so we can find out what the problem is and fix it!

content: Bought, didn't respond well to music, refunded, hue can no longer communicate with all 20+ lights, have to hard reset everything including every bulb and lights trip individually (full reset of even bulbs).  Try again yesterday, same thing happens, now have to spend another couple of hours resetting up hue, resetting all bulbs, force linking them, then all normal app settings and integrations.  How can I like an app that functions poorly, then costs me several hours of time and effort?  After use, all bulbs unreachable. Frustrated, don't have time for this. Regretting trying twice.
replyContent: I'm very sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with the app. Does this issue occur with any other hue app? I'd love to learn a little bit more about what happened. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io so we can troubleshoot. I can also give you a full refund. Thank you.

content: Amaizing use of the hue lights, it's what I've dreamt of. However, I hope there will be another option for audio responses. The visualizer depends on Mic audio and if there's backround noise, talking, parties, etc, it can jumble the responses from the lights . It's hard to get accurate reactions when other noise is being made and you only have 4 bulbs. Maybe someone just wants to put headphones in. It be great if it could work with just the music on one's device, As Well. If there's a setting already or something in making I love to know.
replyContent: Hi Ethan, thanks for the review! Please try adjusting the Volume Trigger under Settings to prevent background noise from interfering. After starting the Music Visualizer, and without any music playing, move the slider handle to the right just far enough so that the effects do not trigger. Please contact support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for help.

content: App is fantastic! If you have problems, check the reviews. Author is responsive, and keeps updating the program. Would recommend any of the 3 Hue controllers they've published.

Absolutely great app, so. Glad. I've downloaded it in time for the party tomorrow. Would be great if the app could more clearly change the lights in time with the beat or bass specifically, maybe something to think about for the next update? If there is a way of achieving this I'd be pleased to hear from the developers
replyContent: Thank you, Justin! Please go to Settings and try adjusting the Volume Trigger while the Music Visualizer is active. You can also toggle on Detect Frequencies and select just the bass. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io if you have any questions. I hope you have a great party!

content: Worked the first day I downloaded it. A week later it stopped. Emailed the developer, got the generic 'look for up, clock the magnifying glass'. It didn't work. Been emailing for help for 2 weeks now. No response. Very disappointed.
replyContent:
Hello, did you receive my email on January 29th? Please try clearing the data and cache for the app. If that doesn't work, please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io. I'm happy to help. Thanks! 
Edit: I just wanted to check to see if you were able to get connected. Please contact me for help. Thank you.

content: Brilliant app and just what I was looking for to sync to music and make everything a bit mad :)   I can only give 4 stars at the moment - MUSIC VISUALIZER  Noticed that if I'm using it, I can't record videos via my phone or any other app. It just crashes the recording app.  - STROBE  Will allow you to record a video but it changes to a slow cycle. Gently running through coulors with 1 second intervals between colour changes.   I haven't investigated anything else and these are just tiny things I can find fault with. Not sure if I always have to manually start with app or if I could link to Google Home via Stringify or IFTTT.  Otherwise brilliant app, well worth the few quid to support a keen developer to make fun lighting in your home easy!   Nice work! Programming and developing isn't easy!  (Samsung S8)

Pretty good but all the power is hidden away in the settings. And for an app called soundstorm, only 1 of the 4 options to control the lights actually responds to sounds or music. Tweaking the settings for bass and frequency response is clumsy and too complicated. Put together a new UI for the audio controls and I'd give this 5 stars.

Frequency range setting on mids is buggy and cannot be properly set.  Interface on music visualizer settings could be improved. Perhaps snapping frequency sliders instead of requiring me to type the frequencies?  Also it would be nice to allow arbitrary number of frequency ranges instead of just bass, mid, treble.
Awesome app, creates a mood to match the music you're playing. I love it!
Wish it could do music visualization directly through music apps, particularly Spotify and SoundCloud.  But great effort was clearly put into the app.

Update in regards to below text. I installed an update to the app and it fixed the issue.   In order to use this app I have to link it with my controller Everytime I open the app. This is pretty annoying as I have to get up walk to another room and push a button whenever I want to use the app.
replyContent: Hi Brian, you should not have to reconnect every time you open the app. Your device may be low on memory or your hue bridge IP address might be changing on your network. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for help.

content: It was working just fine at first. This morning I was playing with the visualizer and it crashed 4 out of 5 of my BULBS! They just went out and won't turn on even when I toggle the switch on the wall. I had one light on another room not connected to the program and it still works. Something has to be done... that's $200 worth of lights that your app just crashed. Help, please!
replyContent: Hi Dylan, the app should not be able to crash your bulbs. There may be a problem with your hue bridge. Please try power cycling your hue bridge and try again. If you still can't connect to your bulbs via the hue app, please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io so I can offer further assistance. Thank you.

content: UPDATE: I was able to chat with Scott via email and after a bit of troubleshooting, he identified the issue and released a fix. The settings menu works well now, and I am happy - this is a fantastic audio visualizer for Hue! Thanks Scott!   Previous review below: ------------- Trying to access settings after the first time just locks up the app. The settings screen will eventually load, but I can't scroll. This is on a Galaxy S6.   I love the app otherwise, please fix. :)
replyContent: Hi Emily, the latest release (1.2.4) should fix the issues you were experiencing with the app. Thanks!

content: Cant figure out how to add new lights or new bridges. Havent been able to do anything with it. üòè
replyContent: Hi Valerie, when you add new lights, pull down the list on the Lights/Groups tab to refresh. You can disconnect from your current bridge my navigating to Settings - Log out.  Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for help. Edit: Please let me know if my suggestion fixed the problem. I'm happy to help. Thanks!

content: Running this app on the Pixel. Music visualizer only works if you have the app focused. If you try running this app in the background, it completely breaks.
replyContent: Hi Randy, the OS slows down certain processes when running apps in the background. It's best to switch to the app before turning off the display when running the app for a long period of time. Edit: This should no longer be an issue with the latest release (1.2.7). Please contact support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io if you have any questions. Thanks!

content: Like the App but I keep having to reconnect to the hue bridge (push the connect button on the hub) every time I start up.... will it not save the connection?
replyContent: Hi David, you should not have to reconnect every time you open the app. Your device may be low on memory or your bridge IP address might be changing on your network. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for help.

content: This app is AWESOME , worth every penny paid for.  And the developer Scott responds to your issues or questions almost immediately, great support. Thanks Scott
Deleted my lights by mistake trying to use app but once you learn how to use it its great
replyContent: I'm sorry that you lost your settings but I don't believe it was caused by this app. You can only manually delete groups. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io so we can investigate this issue further. I will also give you a full refund.

content: Light just seem to. Change completely at random with no rhyme   or Reason. Android 7.0 Moto Z Force
replyContent: Hi Jordan, the app uses digital signal processing to analyze the audio and detect peaks. You may need to adjust the volume trigger. You can test that it's working by enabling 'Detect Frequencies' and targeting a light for each frequency range (bass, mid, treble): https://youtu.be/H-iCZElJ8m0. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io.

content: This app is amazing, however after a month it quit working and said I need to establish a static IP. I couldn't accomplish this or any other remedy. I emailed Scott, who immediately responded and offered help. Through a few email threads, we discovered that clearing cookies AND cache, the problem was resolved. So, if this happens to you, try what I did and it should clear up the issue! Thanks for the quick and efficient response Scott, you are awesome! I look forward to more from you in the future as your apps are by far superior to any other Hue app on the market right now. Trust me, I've tried all of them.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: My favorite Hue app. Super advanced features for syncing your lights to music. You can set specific Hue lights to be triggered by Bass notes, then define what colors you want those lights to cycle between, then you can set other Hue lights to be triggered by Mids (and the corresponding colors for those lights), all the way up to Treble notes. You can even configure the exact Hertz range to trigger each set of lights! This app blows away similar Hue music apps I've tried. It has features I have dreamed about for years, literally. Farewell Hue Disco. I loved you greatly, but the time has come to move on, for far more epic dance parties await. ^_^

First, let me say Scott,  who assisted me with an app issue, is AWESOME! That said,  this app is EQUALLY awesome! The options to personalize your visual show are expansive and reflective of the thought put into this app.  I look forward to coming home to my own personal light dance show... imagine when I have my next party!!! Buy this app... you will NOT be disappointed!!
App looks nice. Unfortunately the most important feature, the music visualiser, does not work. I am on Android 4.3 and yes, the app has record audio privileges.
replyContent: Your device may be too slow to process the data for the music visualizer. The minimum Android version required is now 6.0. I'm very sorry for this inconvenience. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for a full refund. Thank you.

content: Better than Hue Disco, I think.  Can choose which light or group responds to each of bass, mid, and treble.  Chosen colors are what you get, not whites (which was why I returned Hue Disco and got this instead).  Has strobe, color loop, and colors passed from light to light also with several built in color schemes plus create your own.  Settings are accessed from the main screen.  Lights revert to before the app on exit or with a revert button.

I Don't know why I have to reconnect to bridge every time I want to use it. My bridge is downstairs in the basement so it is kind of annoying to always going in the basement to make it sync. Is there a way that it can keep the memory? Thanks
replyContent: You should not have to reconnect to the bridge every time you open the app. Your device may be low on memory or the bridge IP address might be changing on your network. Please contact support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io so we can troubleshoot. Thank you.

content: Music visualizer does not work with either my phone or tablet. Both are android kitcat. Firestorm and thunderstorm both work, but not this. Hope an update fixes it since I paid for this app.
replyContent:
Please check that the app has permission to use your microphone by going to Settings - Apps - Soundstorm for Hue -
 Permissions - Microphone. Edit: Your device may be too slow to process the data for the music visualizer. The minimum Android version required is now 6.0. Please contact me at support@soundstorm.scottdodson.io for a full refund.

content: The best app I've found for music with the Philips hue lights. It's real easy to make custom themes as well.
If you own Hue lights, you need this app! Truly amazing visual when you sync this with music. Unlike anything I have seen before.

Just started playing with this, but so far I love how it works. I only have one of the colored lights, so I put it to sense the bass. The app worked great, and I had a lot of fun playing with the different effects. I'm excited to use it some more!
